resources.string: Try playing Pop - Bubble Popping Game! \n https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.stupidfungames.pop
There was an error checking if you have a continue token. You can watch an ad instead.
The save you are trying to load was saved on a newer version of the game. Please update your game.
There was an error signing in. Try again another time.
There is no save game available. Start a new game
Would you like to sign in to save your progress? Doing so will override your current game save!
Something went wrong. Please try again later
You must login to save your game
You must be logged in to access this feature.
If you already have a save game this will overwrite it. Are you sure you want to proceed?
No items are available at this time.
There was an error equipping your background. Update your app and try again.
Choose an option to continue your game.
You must acquire a continue game token to continue your game.
You must choose one of the options to continue your game.
You can continue to resume your game!
Yes! I\'d like to leave a review.
No. I\'d like to send feedback.
Wake up samurai. We have bubbles to pop.
There was a problem loading the ad. Have a free game continue token!
Thanks for watching have a game continue token!
You must finish watching the ad to get a game continue token.
Allows you to continue your game even after its game over. Can be used once.
Removes all ads from your gaming experience!
Cool background of a bus in Hong Kong
Background of the neon streets of Tokyo
Background of a view from Victoria Peak Hong Kong
Background of a view of Tokyo
Background of a view of the Tokyo skyline
Background of a glass building in Hong Kong
Background of a gradient from red to black
Background of the packed streets of Tokyo
Background of the monster buildings of Hong Kong
Background of the foggy skyline of Tokyo
Background of a huge red lamp
Drag and drop turrets from this icon onto the screen.
Press and hold this icon to get a mace to pop bubbles with.
Toggle this icon to start placing walls onto the screen. To place a wall press and drag on the screen.
Tap this icon to pop all bubbles on the screen in waves. Careful, it takes a long time to recharge.
Touch a bubble to pop it and all nearby bubbles of the same colour.
Touch the bubbles to pop them before they reach the bottom of the screen!\n\nTouch multiple bubbles of the same color to start a streak and earn more points!

Tap on these bubbles to acquire an upgrade.
You can then tap on a tool on the right to upgrade it.
Every tool has a max of 3 upgrades.
Tools will change color to cyan when they are upgradable

The below is a bomb bubble.

Tap on it while it is green to diffuse it and pop some bubbles in a radius around it.

Careful! If it's countdown reaches 0 or you tap on it while it is red it will explode and end the game!

The bomb will flash yellow before becoming red.
Careful! If your score falls below 0 it will be game over.
